original_text: And the anger of the Lord was kindled against Israel, and he delivered them into the hand of Hazael king of Syria, and into the hand of Benhadad the son of Hazael, all their days.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이스라엘에게 노하사 늘 아람 왕 하사엘의 손과 그의 아들 벤하닷의 손에 넘기셨더니

sentences.original_text: And the anger of the Lord was kindled against Israel,
and he delivered them into the hand of Hazael king of Syria,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들을 시리아 왕 하사엘의 손에 넘겨주었고,

sentences.original_text: and into the hand of Benhadad the son of Hazael,
